document.full_text: the bp oil spill that sent 4 million barrels of crude into the gulf of mexico last year also created air pollution, and studying this pollution gave scientists clues into how these contaminants get into the atmosphere.
document.title: bp oil spill offers clues on air pollution: study
lines_and_colors: the bp oil spill that sent 4 million barrels of crude into the gulf of mexico last year also created air pollution, and studying this pollution gave scientists clues into how these contaminants get into the atmosphere.
